A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi is a smart and entertaining film that defies expectations in the most delightful way. \n\nThe newest addition to the Star Wars franchise thankfully avoids becoming a lazy cash-grab by Disney executives. Rather than lazily rehashing the same old\, same old plot points from the original trilogy\, the new film elevates the franchise by combining beloved characters\, familiar themes\, fresh plot twists\, and new blood.
